column5: Just an update: this place cannot be rented for parties.  Very nice 2 bedrooms available in a 3 bedroom home. Bedrooms have a lot of privacy just off to the right as you enter the house with a private bathroom only for guests. This house is close to everything, yet in e very serene area with a park like setting as you can appreciate in the pictures. It is only 5 minutes to Reliant park, and 10 minutes to the Medical Center, Downtown or The Galleria Mall.
column8: Two bedrooms in centrally located gorgeous home.
